H0.text: Which teacher taught Helen Keller to communicate. Alexander Graham Bell

H1.text: Which teacher taught Helen Keller to communicate. Laura Bridgman

H2.text: Which teacher taught Helen Keller to communicate. Michael Anagnos

H3.text: Which teacher taught Helen Keller to communicate. Anne sulavan

A4.text: Anne Sullivan Macy was the instructor and lifelong companion of Helen Keller.

A5.text: Michael Anagnos recommended Anne Sullivan Macy as Helen Keller's teacher.

A6.text: Sullivan taught Keller language, including reading and writing.

A7.text: Michael Anagnos asked Anne Sullivan to become Keller's instructor.
